fields.name: Avatar
fields.value: A man with a white cat on his shoulder. The cat has mismatching eyes, blue & green.

fields.name: Likes
fields.value: Raindrops on roses and whiskers on kittens, reading at sunset, riding at dawn, sword fighting, cooking, rigging and taking pictures, spiders, Truth, Freedom, Justice, Reasonably Priced Love, and a hard boiled egg.

fields.name: Dislikes
fields.value: Global warming, the Overton window moving further right every day, fascists in general, fascist tech billionaires in particular, NFT/crypto goons, football.
